name: AVEHome
0:
”Alexa, turn on bedroom lights”
”Alexa, turn off bedroom lights”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
AVE Home allows you to control lights, dimmers and set the temperatures of your AVE devices using voice commands.
The first time you use AVE Home, users need to connect AVE Home to their AVE Cloud account. Also, please note that at least one smart device must already be present in your AVE Cloud account.
In order to obtain better control performance, it is advisable to indicate an intuitive name for each added device, such as: "bedside" light, "floor" outlet, "living room" thermostat.
